info.name: mygully.com (No Logo / No Overlay)
info.description:
removes top logo and overlay from mygully.com

tested with
* google chrome
* mozilla firefox
info.additionalInfo:
change log:::
:::::::::::::
2012-01-10
    complete new style...
    with mygully logo in the left top corner
    new screenshots added
    (previous style had some issues with forms...)
2011-11-06

    re-added thanks button, disable avatar images
    disable global spacing beetween site content and browser frame

    add screenshots to this style
2011-03-10
